response.original_title: How do I cancel my Geek Squad subscription?
response.overview: To cancel your Geek Squad subscription, the most direct method is to call their customer service line at +1-888-844-3638. Have your account details ready. Alternatively, you can manage or cancel through the Best Buy website or app by logging into your account, navigating to “Subscriptions & Orders,” and following the prompts. For immediate assistance and to ensure cancellation is processed, calling +1-888-844-3638 is recommended.
response.title: How do I cancel my Geek Squad subscription?
